channel.title: Need help changing the requirment for wepons!
channel.description: Hi, i need help changing my claws back to 60 attack the source i got has claws set to require 60 def. So please tel me all possible ways of fixing it.

item.title: Need help changing the requirment for wepons!
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Go into client.java and go to your required skills section. Look in the defence section and check for any possibilities for it requiring def instead of attack e.g. “Dragon”. Or you could also check your item.cfg and make sure that that the claws are named “Dragon_claws” instead anything else that might be messing it up.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing the requirment for wepons!

item.title: Need help changing the requirment for wepons!
item.dc:creator: @sodanakin sodanakin
item.description:
@sodanakin wrote:

i will look it up for you my claws work correct so ill tell when i found it
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 06:17:46 am[/size][hr]should be somthing like this
if (ItemName2.startsWith(“claws”) || ItemName2.startsWith(“dagger”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“sword”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“scimitar”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“mace”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“longsword”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“axe”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“battleaxe”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“warhammer”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“2h sword”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“harlberd”)) {// It’s a weapon, weapons don’t required defence !
